channel.title: Good ears wanted
channel.description:
hai
my speakers suck and im struggling with this mixdown
anyone who can be bothered, listen to it and comment on the mixdown/ghetto mastering pl0x
im especially interested in whether the sub is too quiet/too loud and whether the kick is cutting through the low freqs properly, but tbh any criticism is lovely
warning: not for pure virgin ears who cant handle a bit of ruff tuff and dangerous
http://filelocity.com/?act=download&file=45689b7a4b2e2bd50eb0e129caecdb84
EDIT: Tweaked a bit more, still pretty unhappy with that sub :P

item.title: Good ears wanted
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Reminds me of the music in Test Drive Unlimited.
The sub sounds allright, but yeah the kick needs to be a bit louder imo.

WMA sucks btw, good thing VLC can play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Good ears wanted
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

Needs more bass imo. The sub is weird. Can’t really explain why but it just doesn’t fit

Read full topic
